statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT trajectory_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, satellite_id, trajectory_name FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE start_date < '2021-06-30' AND trajectory_type = 'Orbit';
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE trajectory_type IN ('Orbit', 'Helix') ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, trajectory_name FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT trajectory_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT satellite_id, trajectory_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE trajectory_type = 'Polar' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT satellite_id, trajectory_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory_patterns WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-01' ORDER BY trajectory_name
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_id, launch_date FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trajectory_data WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT data_id, time_of_pass, location_lat, location_long, velocity FROM trajectory_data WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_long < -70;
SELECT satellite_id, trajectory_pattern FROM satellites WHERE trajectory_pattern LIKE '%elliptical%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_id, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trajectory_pattern FROM satellites WHERE trajectory_pattern LIKE '%elliptical%';
SELECT * FROM trajectory_data ORDER BY time_of_pass DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, AVG(velocity) AS avg_velocity FROM trajectory_data GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory;
SELECT satellite_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory WHERE velocity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_info ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT launch_country, COUNT(*) AS num_satellites FROM satellite_info GROUP BY launch_country HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(velocity) AS max_velocity, MIN(velocity) AS min_velocity FROM satellite_trajectory;
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory;
SELECT satellite_name, trajectory_type FROM satellite_trajectory WHERE velocity > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(satellite_name) AS total_satellites FROM satellite_trajectory;
SELECT * FROM satellite_trajectory WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, velocity FROM satellite_trajectory ORDER BY velocity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Satellite WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite WHERE orbit_type = 'LEO';
SELECT observation_date, observation_data FROM Observation WHERE trajectory_id = 3 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_type FROM Satellite ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE observation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Satellite;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, orbit_type FROM Satellite WHERE orbit_type='LEO';
SELECT observation_data FROM Observation JOIN Trajectory ON Observation.trajectory_id = Trajectory.trajectory_id WHERE Trajectory.satellite_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Observation JOIN Analysis ON Observation.observation_id = Analysis.observation_id WHERE Analysis.analysis_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Satellite;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_type, status FROM Satellite WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Trajectory WHERE trajectory_location = 'Space';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM Mission WHERE status = 'Planned';
SELECT * FROM Satellite WHERE orbit_type = 'Low Earth Orbit';
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Trajectory JOIN Satellite ON Trajectory.satellite_id = Satellite.id WHERE trajectory_location = 'Space Station';
SELECT satellite_type, COUNT(*) FROM Satellite GROUP BY satellite_type;
SELECT User.username, QueryHistory.query_date FROM User JOIN QueryHistory ON User.user_id = QueryHistory.user_id WHERE User.registration_date > '2022-01-01';
